VMR-001.Summary: Angela, 50s, from the Omagh area in west County Tyrone, emigrated from NI in 1969 to join her military spouse in England. Over the years they were posted to Malaysia, Singapore, Bahrain, Portugal and Cyprus, returning to their native Tyrone permanently in 1990.
